summary: Orak Ebony-Hand is a Orc follower and is ment for new/early-game players to help with the campaign.
descriptionHtml:
Name: ORAK EBONY-HAND FOLLOWER
Version: 1.0
Date: 1/10/2015
Category: NPCs
Recommended: Manual Installation (NMM Works, but Manual is so easy)
Author(s): Bradley Denton
Source: 
Description
===========
Ever wanted a badass Orc follower with Daedric armor and a Orcish battleaxe? No? Well too bad, because you just got one!
Location
========
To find Orak, go to Falkreath. After reaching Falkreath go to the Dead Man's Drink. He should be there.
Details
=======
Orak Ebony-Hand is basically just the general follow you will get. It is my first mod and I tried hard to put as much effort as my current modding skill will allow (lol). So please don't get to hard on me if it's not perfect. Anyways, Orak Ebony-Hand's backstory starts like this: He was born in Skyrim in an Orc Stronghold. He was a sword-for-hire most his life but then his parents, who he loved and cared for, died. So, he left Skyrim briefly for High Rock but the Bretons disliked his presence. He consider moving to Cyrodiil, but with the Great War in full swing, he moved back to Skyrim, to Falkreath. Where he once again become a sword-for-hire, but without a price.
Please endorse if you like it <3!
Install
=======
This archive is distributed in WinRAR, 7Zip, or any other program that can open .RAR files.
It allows you to manually extract contents of the .RAR or .ZIP files to a certain folder.
Pick which method you are going to use for installation:
Manual Installation
- = or = -
NMM Installation
Manual Install
--------------
1. Extract the archive to your DATA folder in steam/steamapps/Skyrim folder.
folder.
2. Start the Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, and enable the .esp file(s).
Install the mod using NMM:
1. Start Nexus Mod Manager.
2. Double-click the name of the mod in the right-hand side of the Mods screen.
(icon should turn blue). Then click the puzzle piece with the green arrow to enable.
Uninstall
=========
Pick which method you are going to use for uninstall based on how you installed it:
Manual Uninstall
Or
NMM Uninstall
----------------
Manual Uninstall
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.
NMM Uninstall
--------------
1. Start Nexus Mod Manager.
2. Click on the mod name (icon should turn blue), then click the green puzzle piece with the Red arrow pointing opposite to the other puzzle piece.
Upgrade
=======
1. Uninstall the old mod.
2. Install the new mod.
3. Start Skyrim and play. There is no effect on saved games and cannot 
corrupt any saves.
Known Issues or Bugs
====================
If Orak doesn't show up, simply restart the game. If he still doesnt show up, let mods sync and uncheck/check mod in Data Files after. If he STILL doesn't show up, notify me and I will make an update to the mod.
History
=======
Version 1.0: Created.
Contact
=======
You can send me an email here: jakob1121@outlook.com
Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda and Zenimax for Skyrim!
Thanks for Creation Kit existing!
And thanks for the YouTube Tutorials by BestInSlot - Gaming, Dinosaurs, Britishness!
Tools Used
==========
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that 
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
author: Bradley Denton
